tool_description:
Access allucs database of 90+ million video and download links and execute full text search to find cyberlocker and video links related to any topic.

Documentation: http://wiki.alluc.to/API .
For sign up outside of mashape with lower latencies: http://api.alluc.com/
name: video and download link search
title: video and download link search

api_list.name: sourceurl-metadata
api_list.description: Request more information about a source-url (URL where a hoster link was found)

required_parameters.name: md5-of-source-url
required_parameters.description: Request more information about a source-url (URL where a hoster link was found)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/sourcedata/a28d74f3688e0645b0e4fa8a1bed6707"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/sourcedata/{md5_of_source_url}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: hosterurl-filedata
api_list.description: request additional metadata about a filehost-url

api_list.name: thumbnail
api_list.description: Fetch a thumbnail. {imageid} is returned in /api/search/.

required_parameters.name: imageid
required_parameters.description: Fetch a thumbnail. {imageid} is returned in /api/search/.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/thumbnail/NmtrSkpBT2ZFUlJuVzBsM1NWWnBVeXlsNi9hanVVVnN4S0FpZGFiWTJnMD0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/thumbnail/{imageid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alluc-alluc-video-and-download-search-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search for download links using the usual alluc search operators(https://www.alluc.com/about/).

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: where to start. For example if you want result 20-30, you will set count=10 and from=20

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: max-amount of returned results. Can be between 1 - 100.

optional_parameters.name: getmeta
optional_parameters.description: If you want additional info on hosterlinks and source, set this to 1. Only use if you really need it as it might make for slower queries.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: the search string. All alluc search operators can be used (https://www.alluc.com/about/). Make sure to urlencode this.
